#include <iostream>
#include <math.h>
using namespace std;
int main() 
{
	int test;
	cin >> test;
	while(test--)
	{
		long long int n;
		cin >> n;
		n = n * 4;
		n = n + 36;
		n = sqrt(n);
		n = n - 4;
		n = n / 2;
		if (n == 1)
		{
			cout << -1 <<endl;
		}
		else
		{
			cout << n <<endl;
	    }
	}
	return 0;
}
